plays.text: Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Crosschecking Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Roughing Jesse Wallin
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev assisted by Michal Rozsival and Mario Lemieux
Penalty to Jamie Pushor 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Igor Larionov
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Jason Williams and Jiri Fischer
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Hooking Mario Lemieux
Penalty to Alexandre Daigle 2 minutes for Diving Chris Chelios
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Wayne Primeau
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Darren McCarty and Jiri Fischer
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Chris Chelios and Brett Hull
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Brett Hull
Penalty to Brett Hull 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Steve McKenna 2 minutes for Roughing Darren McCarty
Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for Roughing Steve McKenna
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for High Sticking Steve McKenna
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev assisted by Jan Hrdina and Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by Ville Nieminen assisted by Wayne Primeau and Dan LaCouture
Goal scored by Jiri Fischer assisted by Igor Larionov and Mathieu Dandenault
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Kris Draper
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Kris Draper and Darren McCarty
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Slashing Kent Manderville
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Boyd Devereaux
